backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access control, user profile storage, and per-user poster upload/retrieval using blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing poster upload UI changes and fallback image behavior with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file listing short summaries of various frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup including TanStack Router routes, React Query client, and Internet Identity wrapper.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component providing navigation, routed content outlet, and footer except on intro page.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, routing links, and active-state styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and poster blobs via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays themed content and images describing different Brotherhood divisions.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows multi‑section narrative lore about the origins and events of the Copper Age.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards for main site areas.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Full‑screen intro page with background image and a button navigating to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Displays a photo showcase page featuring the T-10 power armor and related accessories using cards and images.
frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx: Provides a poster upload interface with authentication, profile setup, file validation, previewing, and upload progress handling.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Renders detailed descriptions of Brotherhood ranks with styled sections and icon-enhanced cards.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Lists armor and uniform specifications for each rank through structured card components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and design tokens for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including existing and requested features for adding photo upload and backend storage for poster images. Contains metadata, feature lists, and pending requests.
